definition: suffered or done by one person as a substitute for another
details:
adjective
- suffered or done by one person as a substitute for another
= example: suffered or done by one person as a substitute for another
- occurring in an abnormal part of the body instead of the usual site involved in that function
= example: occurring in an abnormal part of the body instead of the usual site involved in that function
- experienced at secondhand
= example: experienced at secondhand
